Step Into Liquid

2004-06-22

Ya, I'm always sceptical when anybody gets obsessive about about a song / album / film... but... you really gotta see Step Into Liquid, and make it a priority. They really show eveything, from the dinkiest ripples to the biggest possible in this timeframe, from the dinkiest people to the top of the pros. I'm going to make a houseparty for Tohoku-Iwate surfer dudes and dudettes to watch it, and try to translate it a little as it goes, since it has not come out here yet. ... otherwise rent it,,, put it on repeat. Yes it is cheezy at times, but that is what workoflove-docu is all about, and the cine & muziq/skore make up for it 100x,,, soo much inner-wave scenery.... I'm serious. And a little yotta.
